About the Company: Steel Strips Infrastructures Ltd.has promoted, developed & manages the ultra modern SAB Mall in the heart of Noida. The shopping complex which has been designed by world renowned Hafeez contractor and the matchless elegance of its premium retail space is no small part of the breathtaking beauty of its architechture. The multi storey shopping mall offers luxury retail & has been designed as a superior platform for buyer  seller matchmaking.
